titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse located at 940 Front Street in San Diego, CA, and the Federal building attached to the courthouse as the "Edward J. Schwartz Courthouse and Federal Building".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1945)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 2/25/1994--Introduced. Designates the United States courthouse and the attached Federal building located at 940 Front Street in San Diego, California, as the Edward J. Schwartz Courthouse and Federal Building.
